arts.ttl: Lazio vs. Torino to close Matchday 30
arts.sum: Lazio have lost only two of their 20 home games against Torino in Serie A in the three points for a win era (W8, D10): among the opponents faced more than 15 times at home in the competition in this period, only against Sampdoria (4%) do the Biancocelesti have a lower defeat percentage than against the Granata (10%). After failing to win against Torino in five consecutive Serie A games (D4, L1), Lazio have won each of their last three meetings against the Granata and they could win four matches in a row against this opponent for the first time in the competition.
